data.eml:eml: New species of the genus Oligoneuriella Ulmer, 1924 (Ephemeroptera: Oligoneuriidae) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sroka, Pavel, Bojková, Jindřiška, Soldán, Tomáš, Godunko, Roman J. (2015): New species of the genus Oligoneuriella Ulmer, 1924 (Ephemeroptera: Oligoneuriidae) from Turkey. Zootaxa 4012 (2): 329-350, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.2.4
